snippet: The title of Robert Bordo’s show “Three Point Turn” may refer to the way several of his paintings explore the themes of flatness and depth by conflating the picture plane with a windshield.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Robert Bordo exhibition of paintings, Three Point Turn, at Alexander and Bonin gallery.
lead_paragraph: The title of Robert Bordo’s show “Three Point Turn” may refer to the way several of his paintings explore the themes of flatness and depth by conflating the picture plane with a windshield.
